name: Gender-Affirming Care
description: Planned Parenthood is proud to provide a safe and welcoming place to get gender-affirming care. We offer services to transgender women, transgender men, and nonbinary people. Services include: - Estrogen and anti-androgen hormone therapy - Testosterone hormone therapy - Puberty blockers - Surgery referrals - Transition support (social, legal) - Other
fullDescription: Planned Parenthood is proud to provide a safe and welcoming place to get gender-affirming care. We offer services to transgender women, transgender men, and nonbinary people. Services include: - Estrogen and anti-androgen hormone therapy - Testosterone hormone therapy - Puberty blockers - Surgery referrals - Transition support (social, legal) - Other
whatTheyOffer: Planned Parenthood is proud to provide a safe and welcoming place to get gender-affirming care. We offer services to transgender women, transgender men, and nonbinary people. Services include: - Estrogen and anti-androgen hormone therapy - Testosterone hormone therapy - Puberty blockers - Surgery referrals - Transition support (social, legal) - Other
howToGetIt: Talk to Planned Parenthood staff online or in-person at your local health center to get the care you need. Make an appointment online or call 1-800-230-PLAN. Not every Planned Parenthood health center provides all services. Check with your nearest Planned Parenthood health center about the services they offer.
agency: Planned Parenthood - San Francisco Health Center
